name: Gassy Goat: A fart fart away tale
name_original: Gassy Goat: A fart fart away tale
description:
Gassy Goat: A fart fart away tale

Do you feel it? it's yours guts trying to send you a message, it's nature saying "You need to be on top of that mountain!!!" 

Feel you insides and poo in explosive fashion to get on top!

How To Poop:

Press G to poop downwards.

Your poop is explosive, use it wisely to go higher into the mountain

Controls:

G - Poop
